summary: This document outlines the responsibilities and processes related to Reputational Risk management within Deutsche Bank. It details the roles of various committees and individuals in monitoring, controlling, and reporting on reputational risks that may affect the bank's operations across different regions.
keyFacts: The document discusses the role of the Primary Reputational Risk Committee (RRRC) in managing reputational risks that impact multiple regions.
It emphasizes the importance of accurate and timely reporting of reputational risk issues to the Committee.
The document outlines the responsibilities of senior representatives in presenting reputational risk issues to the Committee.
